plot: Seabat, the most advanced nuclear submarine ever designed. Covertly developed by the U.S. and Japan, the Seabat is Japan's first nuclear submarine. During the shakedown cruise, the crew declare their sovereignty as an independent nation - provoking a major international incident, and straining U.S.-Japanese relations to the breaking point.
ending_theme: "Yume no Nagisa -The Silent Service-" (夢の渚-The Silent Service-) by Hiroko Kasahara (eps 1-2)
